column1: '''Tatsusoft''' was the company that developed and published ''[[Lord of the Rings: The Duel (video game)|Lord of the Rings: The Duel]]''
column2: one of the first action games based on Tolkien's [[legendarium]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/duel.html The Lord of the Rings: The Duel] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 10 April 2011)</ref><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu
column3: 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 10 April 2011)</ref> The company is currently known as '''TwinSky Games'''.<ref name="Twinsky">[http://www.twinskygames.com/ TwinSky Games]
column4: About (retrieved 10 April 2011)</ref> It was founded by [[Tim Winsky]].<ref name="Twinsky"/>
